*Mantella hears something and spins around and jumps to the side falling on
her butt. *She jumps to her feet and starts shooting eye lasers at
Manterror*

Sent: Friday, May 19, 2000 7:08 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Injector/Manterror:
>
> ::Injector noticed the Predacon Shredder being fired upon by the
autoguns::
> "Shredder...Shredder...ah, the traitor!"
> ::Injector fired off two stinger missiles at Shredder::
> "For Hell Beast!" he yelled.
>
> ::Manterror slowly got up, leaning against the rock, firing an ion disk at
an
> autogun::
> "Slag...I'll...get...that...horned...freak..." ::He said slowly, talking
> about Unitron::
> "Ah...another freak of nature!" ::He said, slowly regaining energy, firing
> off two ion disks at Mantella::
>
